• Include these codes as defined in http://fhir.org/guides/itech-uw/who-smart-hiv-dak/CodeSystem/concept-codes
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    HIV.D.DE116AZT + 3TC + DTGSecond-line ART regimen for adults and adolescents - AZT + 3TC + DTG

    HIV.D.DE120TDF + FTC + DTGSecond-line ART regimen for adults and adolescents - TDF + FTC + DTG
    HIV.D.DE121AZT + 3TC + DRV/rSecond-line ART regimen for adults and adolescents - AZT + 3TC + DRV/r
    HIV.D.DE122AZT + 3TC + ATV/rSecond-line ART regimen for adults and adolescents - AZT + 3TC + ATV/r
    HIV.D.DE123AZT + 3TC + LPV/rSecond-line ART regimen for adults and adolescents - AZT + 3TC + LPV/r
    HIV.D.DE124TDF + 3TC + ATV/rSecond-line ART regimen for adults and adolescents - TDF + 3TC + ATV/r
    HIV.D.DE125TDF + FTC + ATV/rSecond-line ART regimen for adults and adolescents - TDF + FTC + ATV/r
    HIV.D.DE126TDF + 3TC + LPV/rSecond-line ART regimen for adults and adolescents - TDF + 3TC + LPV/r
    HIV.D.DE127TDF + 3TC + DRV/rSecond-line ART regimen for adults and adolescents - TDF + 3TC + DRV/r

    HIV.D.DE129TDF + FTC + DRV/rSecond-line ART regimen for adults and adolescents - TDF + FTC + DRV/r

title: Second-line ART regimen for adults and adolescents Codes
